heroSection.title: From South America, we supply food to the world

item1.title: Trajectory and experience
item1.description: World-class, certified, and sustainable agricultural and aquaculture.

item2.title: Purchasing agent
item2.description: We offer a direct network of regional suppliers.

aboutUsSection.title: About Us
aboutUsSection.subtitle: Trust, sustainability, and commitment in every operation
aboutUsSection.description: American Trading Foods offers a wide range of quality foods, from dairy products and meats to fruits and seafood. We guarantee quality and compliance with the most demanding regulations.

partnerSection.text: We are your strategic partner for your international food business

item1.title: Trust, sustainability, and commitment in every operation
item1.description: The American Trading Foods team is made up of professionals with extensive experience in logistics, food trading, and raw materials.

item2.title: Commercialization and logistics
item2.description: Logistics and supply chain traceability follow the same principles as Organic Certification. The entire process, from acquiring the product at its origin to delivering the final product, is documented and controlled step by step, ensuring that each stakeholder involved in the process guarantees proper traceability in each link.

item3.title: International certifications and quality standards
item3.description: We work with the highest standards in international certifications.

productsSection.title: Products
productsSection.subtitle1: We optimize your buying process, ensuring quality, efficiency, and compliance at every stage

category1.title: Food and agricultural products
category1.description: Agricultural products, dairy products, wines, meats, fish, nuts, and organic seeds of high quality, certified and sustainable.

category2.title: Product consulting and advising
category2.description: We offer expert consulting in the export of food products, optimizing processes and ensuring compliance with international regulations.

category3.title: Suppliers
category3.description: Thanks to our network of reliable suppliers, we ensure an efficient, transparent, and secure supply chain at every stage of the export process.

category4.title: Logistics and distribution
category4.description: We integrate a wide network of agents, professionally managing international logistics, supervising critical points, and reducing delivery times and costs.

productsSection.subtitle2: We have a selection of high-quality products ready to conquer international markets

product1.title: Meat & seafood
product1.description: Quality beef, lamb, and seafood products, meeting international standards.

product2.title: Dairy
product2.description: Certified, fresh, and reliable powdered milk and dairy products.

product3.title: Nuts
product3.description: Almonds, walnuts, pistachios in their various forms.

product4.title: Wine
product4.description: Premium wines, ensuring quality and authenticity.

certificationsSection.title: Certifications
certificationsSection.subtitle: Committed to excellence and safety
certificationsSection.description: Our certifications ensure that all products meet the highest international standards for quality, food safety, and animal welfare, guaranteeing responsible and reliable exportation.

marketsSection.text: Europe, the Middle East, Asia, and Central America are some of the markets we work with

contactsSection.title: Contact us
contactsSection.subtitle: Turn to American Trading Foods for the best South American foods delivered to the world
